name: Furquest
description:
After a game cartridge falls from the sky, you wake up in a strange new world full of big heads, strawberries, manga, and cake! In this world, there are two sides to every soul: Main and Invert!

Welcome to Furquest - a cute RPG about loving your friends!


  • A cute story about a shaggy dog, a lonely bunny, a goofy horse and a... wolf. becoming best friends!

  • Every enemy in Furquest has their own unique minigame for you to play!

  • Tons of games to play in the world - carve pumpkins, decorate snow people, read manga, play basketball + more!

  • Unique boss fights covering a range of different genres from cooking games to visual novels!

  • A sweet art style and a sour soundtrack!


In this world, there are two sides to every coin. Although, while that is also true for your world...

In this world, there are two sides to every soul: MAIN and INVERT. A 'good' Main will be matched by an 'evil' Invert. A 'happy' Main will be matched by an 'unhappy' Invert, and so on.

However...

By stealing the other's soul, the soul thief will transform into an incredibly powerful new form, a HERO SOUL!

After X,000 years of Soul Wars, Prince Aef has made friendship itself a crime as a last ditch effort to separate the groups and protect their souls.

One fateful day, a rather strange puppy wakes up in this world. This is their story... er, quest!

Note from the developer (it's me! :3)

I really want Furquest to be a game you remember, so I tried my best to pack it full of as many memorable characters, minigames, and story moments as possible! There's no shortage of goofs and gaffes, and I tried to keep the pace of the game flowing so you're always discovering something new the more you play! Honestly, just want you to have a pleasant time with the game, and by the end, if you can look back at Furquest fondly, I feel like I've done my job!


I hope you have fun, and I hope you have a great day! :)
